short_summary: Amendment to change Solicitation closing date to January 18th, 2024
description: This amendment is raise to change Solicitation closing date to 18 January 2024<\br>\rNOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT<\br>\rThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt, British Colombia and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.<\br>\rItem 1, GSIN: 4730, NSN: 01-169-9821, NOZZLE, DISTRIBUTION, WATER<\br>\rPart No.: 803-1385828 PC1-5, NCAGE: 80064, NAVAL SHIP SYSTEMS COMMAND<\br>\rQuantity: 50, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Colombia.<\br>\rItem 2, GSIN: 4730, NSN: 01-169-9821, NOZZLE, DISTRIBUTION, WATER<\br>\rPart No.: 803-1385828 PC1-5, NCAGE: 80064, NAVAL SHIP SYSTEMS COMMAND<\br>\rQuantity: 50, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.<\br>\rBidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.<\p>
duration_in_months: And so this concludes a few of the aspects we wish to discuss before the period commences - please ensure to watch till the end. 7 more months with your support of HIE and I wish this time by to explore the package from the folk at your favorite resellory,en nem cannonsmit
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### NOZZLE, DISTRIBUTION, WATER
 procurement publié : No  W8482-242356 / A

*Please note that this procurement has expired*

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the procurement of nozzles, distribution, water, subject to a preference for Canadian goods and services (CFTA). The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.

**Bid Requirements**

* Quantities:
	+ 50 units: Item 1, NOZZLE, DISTRIBUTION, WATER
	+ 50 units: Item 2, NOZZLE, DISTRIBUTION, WATER
* Part Number: 803-1385828 PC1-5, NCAGE: 80064, NAVAL SHIP SYSTEMS COMMAND
* Unit of Issue: EA

**Bidder Requirements**

* Propose your bid, including a brand name and model and/or part number and NCAGE for any Equivalent or Substitute Product
* Bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars
* Any bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected

**Procurement Details**

* Directors Maritime Procurement: the entity managing this procurement
* Ottawa, Ontario | K1A 0K2 | Canada
* Contact Person: Jean-Pierre Normandin, Email: [Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca), Phone: 819 939-3674
* Notice URL: [TBD](TBD)
* Attachment: [26741/rfp-w8482-242356-a-en_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26641/rfp-w8482-242356-a-en_0.pdf), [26741/rfp-w8482-242356-a-amendment-1-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26641/rfp-w8482-242356-a-amendment-1-en.pdf)

Note: This procurement has expired. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. 

(Note, ensure that all necessary formatting is preserved when pasting the output into the box above) 

** Technical Writer's Notes: **

* Added detail headers to break the lengthy text into brief sections, improving readability
* Reformatted existing elements for better visual balance
